title: Waldorf's egg fried rice
ingredients: ['200g rice', '2 large onions, sliced', '2 green chillies, sliced', '5 cloves garlic, finely chopped', '2 teaspoons finely chopped root ginger', '1 tablespoon vegetable oil', '2 to 3 eggs', '1 teaspoon chilli powder', 'salt to taste', '1 drop red food colouring (optional)']
